<p7>I am a PhD candidate in the UC Davis political science graduate program. My research interests include the role and influence of interest groups in policy outcomes, public opinion, and rhetoric in American politics. When I'm not researching American Politics, I'm most likely studying statistics, political theory, or reading science fiction (Frank Herbert's Dune series at the moment).<br><br>
Prior to graduate school, I was a senior staff member for Senator Harry Reid's Washington DC office. You may be wondering, "Who would give up a career in DC politics to go back to school?" Truth be told, owning a dog in DC is extremely difficult and expensive. Going to graduate school was all a front so I could afford a place with a yard for my dog without raising too many questions.</p7></div></div>
